section.section:
"Motor vehicle" means, except as provided in subsection (b) of this section, a vehicle that:
Is self-propelled or propelled by electric power obtained from overhead electrical wires; and
Is not operated on rails.
"Motor vehicle" includes a low speed vehicle.

text.section:
"Motor vehicle" does not include:
A moped, as defined in § 11-134.1 of this subtitle; or
A motor scooter, as defined in § 11-134.5 of this subtitle.
